name: RE:Dress
description:
RE:Dress is a game inspired by Chillia’s Art games. 

It is set in the distant cyber-futuristic world, where full body armor is normalized to combat the pollutants emitted into the environment by the nuclear plant that powers the entire city. 

The player plays as the detective tasked to reopen a 7 year-old cold case, and to finally close it out once and for all. However, the more evidence the detective finds, the closer the terrifying truth comes out.

*Currently a playable demo*

Made for the month-long Yandere Game Jam 2023 -->  https://itch.io/jam/yandere-game-jam-2023
